sn26.6:4.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, rūpasaññāya uppādo ṭhiti … pe …
sn26.6:4.4: yo dhammasaññāya uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn26.6:4.5: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpasaññāya nirodho … pe …
sn26.6:4.7: yo dhammasaññāya nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
